The Venus Host has an Offer for You Fools in Love: Shared Hosting for $2.47/mo (No Annual Contract Required!)

april fool's day, custom control panel, shared, shared hosting, the venus host April 1, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

The goddess of love has returned!  Well, if not the goddess of love, at least a deity specializing in budget shared hosting.  Welcome back, The Venus Host!  We last featured them on Valentine’s Day.

It is April Fool’s Day, so if you’re a fool in love, check out The Venus Host’s offer: shared hosting for $2.47/month – no annual contract required!  However, if you choose to signup for a year, you only pay for 10 months.

I think that last point deserves emphasis.  You can try The Venus Host with no commitment.  A lot of the big hosts require annual (or even 3-year!) sign ups to get their best price.  The Venus Host wants to earn your business every month.

You can check out a demo of their control panel on their web site.

They are registered in India (GST 27BSJPK2416A1Z6). Their Terms of Service is available on their web site (Privacy Policy). They accept international payments through PayPal and local payments through local payment gateway CCavenue and Razorpay.
